title: 'Star Trek: Starfleet Academy': Robert Picardo and Gina Yashere on embracing the legacy of their roles in latest Trek show (interview)
description: "It's hopeful about the future, and we need that optimistic enthusiasm right now."
content: "It's hopeful about the future, and we need that optimistic enthusiasm right now."
